name: Merriment Carrying Caravan
overview: Merriment Carrying Caravan tells the story of a 42 years settler (Dickens Ford) that travels through a colonial planet called Grant with his 4 daughters, the game takes place during a whole year and the player got to earn money and make the life of the girls happier. The caravan compete against other families: Butler (company Wing Over), Miller, Nelson, King & High Net Transport. There are different trade routes to travel and trade. The gameplay is an strategy adventure that places your party in the task of establishing trade routes, managing resources and exploring new cities, etc. The game features japanese voice acting for the main characters.
